column1: # CardDemo Test Fixture - Card Data CSV
# Spring Batch CSV test fixture for credit card data processing tests
# This file provides comprehensive test scenarios for:
# - Spring Batch FlatFileItemReader integration testing
# - Card-account cross-reference validation with foreign key constraints
# - PostgreSQL cards table integration with exact VSAM field mappings
# - Card security testing scenarios including CVV validation and Luhn algorithm verification
# - Card lifecycle management testing (active/inactive status transitions)
# - Cross-reference relationship testing between cards
# Schema: Matches PostgreSQL cards table structure from V4__create_cards_table.sql
# Source: Converted from fixed-width ASCII carddata.txt (VSAM CARDDAT equivalent)
# Field Definitions:
# - card_number: 16-digit credit card number (PRIMARY KEY) with Luhn algorithm validation
# - account_id: 11-digit account identifier (FOREIGN KEY to accounts table)
# - customer_id: 9-digit customer identifier (FOREIGN KEY to customers table)
# - cvv_code: 3-digit Card Verification Value for security testing
# - embossed_name: Cardholder name as printed on card (max 35 characters)
# - expiration_date: Card expiration date in YYYY-MM-DD format
# - active_status: Card lifecycle status (Y=Active
# Test Scenarios Included:
# 1. Valid Luhn algorithm card numbers for algorithm verification testing
# 2. Cross-reference foreign key relationships for referential integrity testing
# 3. Various card statuses for lifecycle management testing
# 4. CVV codes for security validation testing
# 5. Expiration dates spanning past
# 6. International characters in embossed names for character set testing
# 7. Edge cases for field length and format validation
# Performance: Supports 10
column2: 000+ TPS throughput testing with Spring Batch chunk processing
